Oct. 31, 1970 D Whitburn Invitation Contest
Whitburn Invitation Contest 0 Entertainments Contest
whitburn-invitation-contest

Entertainments Contest
Whitburn Academy Best section 2 band - Croy Parish. Best section 3 band - MacTaggart Scott. Best section 4 band - Shotts St Patrick. Contest held to celebrate Whitburn Band Centenary, each band playing a twenty minute programme.
Aug. 24, 2012, 11:57 a.m. March 25, 2013, 10:23 p.m.
